titles.title: For the relief of Rigaud Moise, Cinette Dorlus Moise, Jean Rigaud Moise, and Phara Moise.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 1/20/2001--Introduced. Declares Rigaud Moise, Cinette Dorlus Moise, Jean Rigaud Moise, and Phara Moise to be eligible for immigrant visas or adjustment of status to lawful permanent resident of the United States under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
